verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: dined] [ARG1: with Kim Jong Un 's right - hand man] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday night] [ARGM-PRP: in an effort to salvage President Trump 's summit with North Korea] .
[ARG0: Secretary] of State Mike Pompeo dined with Kim Jong Un 's right - hand man on Wednesday night in an effort to [V: salvage] [ARG1: President Trump 's summit with North Korea] .
